transcript: If I started a business, I would say that it would be a startup, a high-tech startup, because I've been always wondering about the opportunity to make something new and to bring new technologies or new solutions in our fast-moving and fast-growing world. would provide a lot of services like for example consulting in some spheres and i will differentiate myself from competitors through the quality of my services and also through the way how we work with people and with the companies and that we would have a really good we will show our good will and i would say that our long-term goals will be the uh share of the share of satisfied clients yeah i would say that

assessment.hr_summary: The candidate demonstrates a strong profile for a team-oriented role, with high conscientiousness, moderate openness, and high agreeableness. The motivation level is medium, with consistent energy and a proactive tone. The candidate is a motivated and confident individual who is well-suited for a role that values creativity, responsibility, and teamwork.
